paper_abstract: This paper presents an interference cancellation and multipath mitigation algorithm for use in Global Positioning System (GPS) with an array antenna. It is shown that interference signals and multipath signals are effectively suppressed using a serial subspace projection method without any knowledge of the incoming directional information. After the subspace projections, a beamformer is used to maximize the SNR of the received signal. The enhancement in the performance is presented in terms of the cross correlation value and beam patterns.
paper_title: Interference cancellation and multipath mitigation algorithm for GPS using subspace projection algorithms
